content.en_US: Oil in a solid, conveniently cuboid form. Burns twice as long as coal and way hotter. Commonly made in a [[solidifier|Solidifier]] or [[pyrolysis oven|Pyrolysis Oven]]. Used in solid rocket propellant.
content.zh_CN: 方便处理的方块状固体油。具有煤炭两倍的燃烧时间，而且温度更高。通常在[[工业固化机|Solidifier]]或[[热解炉|Pyrolysis Oven]]中制作。
